alert.note: Alert for Allamakee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 22 at 10:23PM CST until December 23 at 11:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Allamakee County. In Minnesota, Dodge, Fillmore, Houston, Olmsted, and Winona Counties. * WHEN...Dense fog begins developing after midnight with widespread dense fog through the remainder of the overnight and into the morning hours on Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
